doc:
Bruce Glover https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bruce_Glover 0 Bruce Herbert Glover (born May 2, 1932) is an American character actor perhaps best known for his portrayal of the assassin Mr. Wint in the James Bond film Diamonds Are Forever. He is the father of actor Crispin Glover. Bruce_Herbert_Glover ( born May_2_,_1932 ) is an_American_character_actor perhaps best_known for his_portrayal of the_assassin_Mr._Wint in the_James_Bond_film_Diamonds Are Forever . He is the_father of actor_Crispin_Glover .
